name: Memorix Styling Guidelines
description: Rules to ensure consistent styling across the Memorix website

rules.name: Use Tailwind for styling
rules.description: Use Tailwind CSS classes for all styling instead of CSS modules or inline styles
good_examples: className="text-white bg-[#18092a]/60 rounded-xl px-5 py-3.5 border border-gray-800/30"

rules.name: Color scheme
rules.description: Use consistent color scheme throughout the application

rules.name: Primary accent color
rules.description: Use #00ff94 as the primary accent color for interactive elements

rules.name: Background gradient
rules.description: Use consistent background gradient for page backgrounds

rules.name: Card styling
rules.description: Use consistent card styling with dark background, border and shadow

rules.name: Button styling
rules.description: Use consistent button styling with rounded corners and hover effects
good_examples: bg-[#00ff94]/10 text-[#00ff94] px-4 py-2 rounded-lg hover:bg-[#00ff94]/20 transition-colors border border-[#00ff94]/30

rules.name: Functional components
rules.description: Use functional components with React hooks

rules.name: Imports organization
rules.description: Organize imports with React imports first, then third-party libraries, then local components

rules.name: Responsive design
rules.description: Use responsive classes to ensure the website looks good on all screen sizes
